name: No Escape
Lore: 'Jabba''s influence is not easily ignored. Neither are his voracious and vile appetites. Even Jedi soon learn this lesson.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. You may immediately take top card of Lost Pile into hand. Effects, Epic Events, and Objectives are immune to Honor Of The Jedi. At each opponent''s <> site, your characters and vehicles are each deploy -3 and your Force generation is +1. (Immune to Alter.)',
